mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO cm_business_shop( shopName, address, owner, code, uid, ownerPaperPic, ownerPaper, categoryId, creator, createDate, status )VALUES
( #{item.shopName}, #{item.address}, #{item.owner}, #{item.code}, #{item.uid}, #{item.ownerPaperPic}, #{item.ownerPaper}, #{item.categoryId}, #{item.creator}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.status} )
mapper.select: SELECT cbs.*,csc.`name` AS categoryName,cud.username as username, cud.nickname as nickname FROM cm_business_shop cbs LEFT JOIN cm_user_detail cud on cbs.uid = cud.`code` LEFT JOIN cm_sys_category csc ON cbs.categoryId = csc.id WHERE cbs.code = #{code}

SELECT cbs.*,csc.`name` AS categoryName,cud.username as username, cud.nickname as nickname FROM cm_business_shop cbs LEFT JOIN cm_user_detail cud on cbs.uid = cud.`code` LEFT JOIN cm_sys_category csc ON cbs.categoryId = csc.id WHERE cbs.uid = #{uid} and cbs.status = 0;
mapper.update: UPDATE cm_business_shop SET income4Sum = income4Sum + #{income},withdrawable = withdrawable + #{income}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(createDate/1000),'%m月') as name,count(id) as value FROM cm_business_shop WHERE DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(createDate/1000),'%m') = DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval #{month} month),'%m') GROUP BY name ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT shopName, code, income4Sum FROM cm_business_shop WHERE income4Sum > 0 ORDER BY income4Sum desc limit 0,10;
